<h2>AgenciaSEO.eu</h2>.company_description:
The mission of this agency is to make the digital marketing strategy of its clients profitable.

At agenciaSEO.eu they strive to achieve the best results with tailored strategies in SEO, PPC, analytics, conversion and content marketing.

products.product_name: SEO Positioning (Original name (Spanish): Posicionamiento SEO)
products.product_description:
If they don't see you, you don't exist and especially on the internet, where 80% of users don't go past the first page of results.

SEO positioning allows companies to place their website in the top positions of search engines such as Google, providing them with maximum quality visibility based on keywords related to their project or business. In this way, quality organic traffic is increased, multiplying conversion opportunities.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Tourist Destinations
  • Theme Parks
  • Tourism Offices
  • Hotels
  • Travel Agencies
  • Events and Festivals
  • MICE
  • Active Tourism Companies
  • E-Commerce.

products.product_name: PPC / Social Ads
products.product_description:
Design of immediate visibility strategies to accelerate business objectives.

Through PPC campaigns you can be visible to the target audience of a business or company, quickly and effectively, achieving a high conversion rate. At AgenciaSEO.eu they optimize these campaigns to achieve a positive and fast return on investment.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Tourist Destinations
  • Theme Parks
  • Tourism Offices
  • Hotels
  • Travel Agencies
  • Events and Festivals
  • MICE
  • Active Tourism Companies
  • E-Commerce.

products.product_name: Web analytics and CRO (Original name (Spanish): Analítica web y CRO)
products.product_description:
The analytics service allows you to evaluate and understand the actions carried out on the website of a business and/or company, in order to improve the digital marketing strategy, optimize ROI and achieve business objectives.

This service is essential to understand users, improve conversions and get the most out of any online business.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Tourist Destinations
  • Theme Parks
  • Tourism Offices
  • Hotels
  • Travel Agencies
  • Events and Festivals
  • MICE
  • Active Tourism Companies
  • E-Commerce.

<h2>Amazing Up</h2>.company_description:
Amazing UP is a technology-based company located in the Science and Technology Park of the Universitat Jaume I of Castellón (Spain), specialized in digitalization processes for the tourism sector.

Creators of the first tourist gamification app in Spain, they have extensive experience in the field of creative and technological industries, and with an interdisciplinary team made up of professionals from the fields of engineering, computing, design and communication, which work with the corporate purpose of creating more social and interactive leisure. Our product and service lines focus on virtual reality technologies, totems and apps, chatbots, artificial intelligence, internet of things and musealization of spaces.

products.product_name: Virtual, Augmented and Extended Reality Projects (Original name (Spanish): Proyectos de Realidad Virtual, Aumentada y Extendida)
products.product_description: They are responsible for developing technological applications of virtual, augmented and mixed reality to promote tourist spaces and create gamified experiences.
products.target_audience:

  • Tourism Offices
  • Theme Parks
  • Hotels
  • Restaurants
  • Active Tourism Companies.

products.product_name: OK my hotel
products.product_description: Artificial intelligence system for the interrelation between tourist establishments and their clients.

  • Theme Parks
  • Hotels
  • Restaurants.

products.product_name: Internet of Tourism (Original name (Spanish): Internet del Turismo)
products.product_description: Implementation of sensors and smart city systems through Internet of Things technology.

<h2>Amundsen Estrategia y Comunicación<.company_description: Tourism development consultant specialized in technical assistance to destinations and companies for their access and DTI management, sustainability plans, tourism strategy and communication.

products.product_name: DTI Assistance (Original name (Spanish): Asistencia DTI)
products.product_description: Technical assistance in access to DTI, monitoring and management of the destination in the implementation of solutions established in the Master Plan.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

products.product_description: Development of online communication strategies based on audience segmentation, content strategy, analysis and monitoring.

Target audience

products.product_name: Governance (Original name (Spanish): Gobernanza)
products.product_description: Assistance in the management and implementation of intelligent solutions and creation of tourism governance models.

<h2>Bioscore</h2>.company_description:
Bioscore is a technology company located in Valencia that seeks to integrate sustainability in hotels and chains with the aim of providing value and competitiveness to the sector.

They have a certification system, which allows evaluating the level of sustainability of a hotel. The Bioscore icons position establishments based on a new criterion that conveys an accommodation's commitment to society and the environment. Likewise, they provide software as a tool to develop and manage the sustainability plan and efficiently report ESG (Environmental, Social and Governance) information. In addition, they provide a sustainability rating to OTAs and TTOO. Its mission is to democratize sustainability.

products.product_name: Platform Digital Bioscore (Original name (Spanish): Plataforma Digital Bioscore)
products.product_description:
Its platform, 100% online, is a technological tool to develop and manage the sustainability plan and efficiently report ESG (Environmental, Social and Government) information.

It is a unique space that allows data to be collected, measured and shared. In addition, it allows for the preparation of sustainability reports and reports, essential documents for building CSR and communicating it to interest groups.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Hotels
  • Restaurants
  • Tourist Destinations.

<h2>Cerium</h2>.company_description:
Technological integrator specialized in network and communications infrastructures oriented to the hotel sector, a technology-based company whose greatest asset is its team, with more than 15 years of experience in the development of technological projects in the hotel field on a global basis.

We are facing a technological revolution that is advancing at a dizzying pace and that places us before the profile of a hyperconnected guest, which is why Cerium firmly believes that having an adequate infrastructure is a decisive commitment to improving the competitiveness of your hotel and be prepared for the guest of the present and the near future. Its clear value proposition is based on: specialization in the hotel sector, the customization of all its products and security as the DNA of its entire offering.

products.product_name: GPON network infrastructure (Original name (Spanish): Infraestructura de red GPON)
products.product_description:
GPON (Gigabit Passive Optical Network) technology is the core of communications in the world, a technology that uses fiber optics to reach the guest, their room or any corner of your hotel.

By applying GPON to a hotel complex, it is possible to integrate, through the deployment of the FTTR (Fiber to the Room) installation, a technological system that allows a multitude of services to be available through a fiber optic thread.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Hotels

products.product_name: WiFi network infrastructure (Original name (Spanish): Infraestructura de red WiFi)
products.product_description: Analysis of your Wi-Fi network to know its weak points and possible improvements to subsequently design, implement and maintain an optimal and secure network infrastructure, allowing the hotelier to offer, through it, numerous digital services to its guests and incorporate new technologies that will enhance the efficiency and automation of hotel processes.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Hotels

products.product_name: Cybersecurity (Original name (Spanish): Ciberseguridad)
products.product_description:
With the firm purpose of “democratizing” and bringing cybersecurity closer to users, Cerium makes available to the sector a suite of selected applications and services to implement in each hotel and make cybersecurity available to everyone.

In addition, they have training plans, cyber-risk policies, cybersecurity audits and a team of highly qualified engineers with extensive experience to design and implement customized cybersecurity projects with guarantees of success.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Hotels

<h2>Deepsense</h2>.company_description:
Company specialized in Artificial Intelligence and Deep Learning.

We develop customized products to extract knowledge from the data of companies in the tourism sector, smart destinations and administrations.

products.product_name: Tailored Data Analytics and Artificial Intelligence Services for Destinations and Tourism Companies (Original name (Spanish): Servicios de Analítica de Datos e Inteligencia Artifi cial a medida de Destinos y Empresas Turísticas)
products.product_description:
Development of customized projects for destinations and tourism companies based on advanced data analytics and Artificial Intelligence, with the aim of helping to extract value from information to be more efficient and make better decisions and provide them with tools that facilitate management and allow us to offer personalized and quality experiences.

Main “bullet points” are the analysis of tourist behavior through tourist card data and other data from external sources; the analysis of clandestine tourist housing and development of a predictive dashboard. Development of tourism recommendation systems and application of Generative Artificial Intelligence models for the automation of tourism marketing processes.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Tourist Destinations
  • Theme Parks
  • Tourism Offices
  • Hotels
  • Travel Agencies
  • Events and Festivals
  • MICE
  • Active Tourism Companies.

products.product_name: Training in Government, Data Analytics and Artificial Intelligence for Tourism Companies and Tourist Destinations (Original name (Spanish): Formación en Gobierno, Analítica de Datos e Inteligencia Artifi cial para Empresas Turísticas y Destinos Turísticos)
products.product_description:
Training in data analysis and artificial intelligence for teams from tourist destinations and tourism companies with the aim of providing tools for the implementation of their own use cases, designing and directing data analytics projects.

The focus of the training is on low-code data analysis tools (without programming) in the tourism sector; visualization tools and dashboards; data governance and strategy; data modeling, Machine Learning and AI; process automation and generative AI among others.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Tourist Destinations
  • Hotels
  • Travel Agencies
  • Active Tourism Companies.

<h2>Dielmo 3D</h2>.company_description:
Dielmo 3D is one of the main providers of geographic information in Spain, a concept that began to be fundamental in the era of geo-information and new ICTs.

Since 2016, the company has been committed to developing a series of products and services related to 360º photography for the digitization of tourist resources in destinations and the digitization of company facilities. Providing differentiated image quality generated with the support of cartographic techniques, generating high resolution panoramic views.

products.product_name: Immersive Hotel (Original name (Spanish): Hotel Inmersivo)
products.product_description:
Innovative technological tool that transforms the main website of tourist establishments into a digital twin.

It offers an immersive tour in high resolution, without stereotypical routes, allowing free navigation for guests. Tool of great value both for the hotel pre-booking channel and for the customer experience. It is affordable and does not require integration with a hotel management system (PMS). It is responsive and multi-platform, which guarantees universal accessibility to every corner of the establishment. A sustainable project that has an investment in its own technology. This immersive and personalized experience builds customer loyalty, increases direct sales of the establishment and enriches the user experience, thus supporting the objectives of the marketing department and the revenue team. It contributes to enhancing the establishment's brand and gives the possibility of integrating a Digital Tourist Viewpoint, showing the destination and providing relevant information to the guest for planning their trip.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Hotels.

products.product_name: Digital Tourist Viewpoint (Original name (Spanish): Mirador Turístico Digital)
products.product_description:
Digital tool for tourist destinations that allows outstanding promotion through the creation of a Digital Tourist Viewpoint in virtual reality, using high-resolution 360º photographs (Gigapanoramic up to 80 GPX).

This unique virtual setting incorporates panoramic views of the location, which can be easily explored by users. Local tourist resources are integrated with relevant multimedia content to provide information about points of interest. The project is part of a sustainable approach with dissemination through a personalized website adapted to each destination, thus enhancing the brand of the place, creating immersive and multimedia content that includes virtual visits, augmented reality, digitization of heritage, digital media, signage physical and intelligent, aerial photography, translations, voiceovers for audio guides, detailed photography book, product photography, among other services, combining virtual tourism and experiential tourism. Offers data control and usage statistics.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Tourist Destinations
  • Tourism Offices.

products.product_name: Immersive Contents (virtual visits/360º tours). Digitization of Spaces, Resources and Facilities. (Original name (Spanish): Contenidos Inmersivos (visitas virtuales/tours 360º). Digitalización de Espacios, Recursos e Instalaciones.)
products.product_description:
Creation of immersive content through the development of virtual tours using high-resolution 360º photography.

Its approach focuses on digitalization and free access through navigation to various heritage sites, establishments, events, routes, museums and viewpoints, both natural and urban. In addition, it has the ability to apply augmented reality content, generating enriching experiences that allow interaction with avatars in 2D/3D format. Likewise, gamification is incorporated into the project to provide a playful and attractive experience to users.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Tourist Destinations
  • Theme Parks
  • Tourism Offices
  • Hotels
  • Travel Agencies
  • MICE.

<h2>Doblemente</h2>.company_description: Doble is a software company dedicated to offering innovative solutions for the sale and management of tourist reservations, focused on meeting the needs of incoming agencies and tour and transfer companies.

products.product_name: I have (Original name (Spanish): Dispongo)
products.product_description:
Dispongo is a tourism reservation sales and management software that provides clients with the option to charge their own FIT rates, perform XML integrations with bed banks and channel managers and manage the sale to the final customer + B2B.< /p>

In addition, this technological solution offers companies full control over the booking engine and allows them to issue vouchers and invoices automatically.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Incoming Tourism Companies
  • Travel Agencies
  • Active Tourism Companies
  • Tourist Destinations
  • Theme Parks
  • MICE
products.solType:
Solution type:

  • Consultancy
  • Management program
  • Booking engine
  • API Integration
  • GDS Tourist Products
  • ERP Tourist Companies
  • ERP for ticket sales and tourist services
  • Online commerce (e-commerce)
  • Software
  • Chatbot Language Processing

<h2>Experticket</h2>.company_description:
Experticket is a Global System for the distribution of tickets and tourist services that facilitates total control over the distribution and sale of tickets, being a 100% flexible and customizable technological solution to adapt to the unique needs of each client.

Experticket allows companies to control their distribution, while carrying out a comprehensive analysis of billing and accounting information.

products.product_name: GDS (Global Distibution System)
products.product_description:
Experticket is a GDS (Global Distribution System) that offers:

  • Unique catalog. Discover the power of dynamic rates and prices.
  • Distribution control. Decide with one click how and to whom to sell. Simple and effective.
  • Access control. Turnstiles, mobile phones, PDAs... you decide.
  • Billing and accounting. All information flow perfectly traced and automated.
  • Simple and powerful API. It has never been so easy to connect to a distribution system.
  • Total flexibility. The client decides what they need with a guarantee of 100% integration.
  • Compliance Guarantee. You'll have to work with us to believe it, but we always meet deadlines.
  • Project support and management. Accompaniment in all phases of the project (implementation and exploitation).
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Tourist Destinations
  • Tourism Offices
  • Theme Parks
  • Events and Festivals
  • Active Tourism Companies.

<h2>ForwardKeys</h2>.company_description:
ForwardKeys sets travel trends and provides insights into who is traveling where and when.

With the most comprehensive air travel database in the industry, including tickets booked both through travel agencies and directly from airlines, they keep their customers informed about travel patterns, demand, impact of events on travel and the preferences of different traveling audiences, helping travel-dependent companies understand their future business.

products.product_name: Destination Gateway
products.product_description:
It's a place where all your air travel data needs come together.

They help cities, regions and countries understand how travel trends have affected their destination, reveal new market opportunities and monitor their progress along the way. With just one click, you can access a DMO-specific control panel with all your travel needs tailored to your needs. Easy to use, navigate and share key information.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Touristic destinations
products.solType:
Solution type:

  • Data Analytics Systems (Big Data)
  • Geographic Information Systems (GIS)
  • Plataforma DTI/ Smart City
  • Artificial intelligence

products.product_name: ForwardKeys Nexus
products.product_description:
Most advanced travel business intelligence (BI) solution.

The comprehensive platform is suitable for business analysts or marketers to analyze the complete perspective on the impact of travelers on their destination. It offers fl exibility and power with respect to the type of analysis that can be performed and also great granularity and detail; Its level of sophistication requires a degree of knowledge to be able to start using it, the training of which will be provided by the company.

products.product_name: ForwardKeys API
products.product_description: Solution so that developers can automate the extraction of the most relevant information programmatically and inject it into their own dashboards, reports and applications.

<h2>Gaia Green Tech</h2>.company_description:
Gaia Green Tech offers electric vehicle chargers for your business.

Without investment! Leading car charger rental company: you only pay a subscription and forget about everything.

products.product_name: Renting of electric car chargers (Original name (Spanish): Renting de cargadores de coches eléctricos)
products.product_description:
It offers a service for those accommodations that wish to have electric vehicle charging points for their clients or employees.

With a minimum monthly subscription they take care of the entire process: from project planning, installation and user support, to maintenance, insurance, charger replacement and management through APPs. No fine print and no extra costs guaranteed; You will only have to choose the type of recharge (free or paid) that you prefer to offer and they will take care of everything.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Tourist Destinations
  • Theme Parks
  • Hotels
  • Restaurants.

<h2>Glop Software TPV</h2>.company_description:
The Glop company has been developing computer solutions for restaurants, cafes and nightclubs for more than 25 years with the aim of digitizing and automating their work and management processes.

Adapted to the new hospitality industry that needs new sales channels, online reservations, cost management, marketing, customer loyalty and improvement of the customer experience.

products.product_name: Gulp (Original name (Spanish): Glop)
products.product_description:
Glop is a management and point of sale software for hospitality, with more than 16.

000 licenses sold, which automates sales management such as taking orders at the table, delivery orders (Globo, Just Eat, etc.), own store, digital menu, self-order kiosks and sends the orders to the kitchen for its management (KDS). It organizes the service and the waiters, the order of the dishes and the management of the tables and allows the customer to pay the bill from their mobile phone through a QR code printed on the bill receipt, reducing waiting times for the customer and improving employee operations. Manage purchasing processes, orders from suppliers, inventories and invoices to know the cost of production, margins and profits. Available for tablets and touch terminals.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Hotels
  • Restaurants
  • Events and Festivals.

<h2>Insyde</h2>.company_description:
Insyde is a company founded in 2012 specialized in the development of products for the management and digitalization of destinations or tourism offices (DTI).

Currently, its products are present in more than 100 tourist destinations and organizations, among which Turisme Comunitat Valenciana, Prodetur, Cantur (Cantabria tourism), Benidorm, Gandía, Benicàssim, Visit Valencia, Comillas, Campello stand out. , Torrevieja, San Carles de la Rápita and Lloret de Mar.

products.product_name: Infotourist Oﬃ ce (Original name (Spanish): Infotourist Oﬃ ce)
products.product_description:
• Management of information points.
  • Advanced system of attention and decentralization of tourism offices.
  • User administration.
  • Api and Api integration for integration with external management and DTI platforms.
  • INFOTOOLS. Tool for attention and provision of digital information.
  • Content and database manager.
  • CMS web page.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Tourist Destinations
  • Tourism Offices
  • Active Tourism Companies
  • Tourist Guide Companies
  • Incoming Tourism Companies.
products.solType:
Solution type:

  • Tourism CRM
  • Marketing Digital
  • Communication platforms, training or webinars
  • Plataforma DTI/ Smart City

products.product_name: Infotourist NET
products.product_description:
Infotourist Net is a complete and integral solution for the efficient management of a network of tourism offices, which allows centralized and real-time management of tourist information, the personalization of customer service, the taking of strategic decisions based on statistics and reports generated by the solution and better promotion and marketing of the destination.

Infotourist Net is the key to improving the quality and efficiency of the tourist service in your entity. The entities that already have this solution are Turisme Comunitat Valenciana for its network of tourism offices, Turismo de Catalunya, Cantur, Prodetur, Navarra Turismo and Turismo de Lanzarote. In total there are more than 700 tourism offices that benefit from the INFOTOURIST NET solution.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Tourist Destinations
  • Tourism Offices.
products.solType:
Solution type:

  • Tourism CRM
  • Communication platforms, training or webinars
  • Data Analytics Systems (Big Data)

<h2>Inteligencia Turística, S.L.</h2>.company_description: Tourist Intelligence is a technology consultancy that specializes in normalizing the transformation process of smart tourist destinations and tourist intelligence systems, as well as incorporating surveillance and competitive intelligence in destinations and tourist organizations.

products.product_name: Implementation of Standards related to DTI and Tourism Intelligence and Intelligent Tourism Companies, Implementation of Certifications (Original name (Spanish): Implantación Normas relacionadas con DTI e Inteligencia Turística y Empresas Inteligentes, Turísticas, Puesta en Marcha de Certifi caciones)
products.product_description:
We were pioneers by implementing the UNE 166006 tourism intelligence standard in the tourism sector in 2014 and in 2018 the UNE 178501 standard in Benidorm, the first certificate in the world.

Advice and support in the implementation of the following standards UNE 166006: R&D&I Management: Competitive Surveillance and Intelligence, tourism intelligence, UNE 178501 Management System for Intelligent Tourist Destinations, UNE 178502 indicators and Tools for DTI .
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Tourist Destinations
  • Hotels
  • Travel Agencies
  • Events and Festivals
  • MICE.
products.solType:
Solution type:

  • Plataforma DTI/ Smart City
  • Data Analytics Systems (Big Data)
  • Consultancy

products.product_name: DTI management software: CICLOPS DTI®, SMART OFFICE DTI® (Original name (Spanish): Software gestión DTI: CICLOPS DTI®, SMART OFFICE DTI®)
products.product_description:
The work team of a DTI needs tools to monitor and manage its transformation into a DTI, which is why CICLOPS DTI® allows control of both the strategy, indicators and processes according to the national DTI Network, DTI Network CV, UNE 178501, UNE 178502.

In addition, it serves as a tool for the technical offices of management of the PSTD-Sustainability Plans at the destination. With the Smart Office DTI® it is possible to have a physical space for DTI managers, where they can manage DTI cyclops, tourist intelligence units and federated platforms implemented in the destination.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Touristic destinations.

products.product_name: DTI Diagnostics, Development of DTI Master Plans, Tourism Strategic Plans, Destination Sustainability Plans and PSTD Technical Management Offices (Original name (Spanish): Diagnósticos DTI, Desarrollo Planes Directores DTI, Estratégicos de Turismo, Planes de Sostenibilidad en Destino y Ofi cinas Técnicas de Gestión PSTD)
products.product_description: We accompany destinations in carrying out the diagnoses of the national DTI Network and DTI CV Network, as well as in the drafting of DTI master plans and Strategic Tourism Plans, we prepare PSTD aid and manage the technical management offices for the PSTDs of the destinations.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Touristic destinations.

<h2>Kalmas Gestión Empresarial, S.L.</h2.company_description:
Specialized in intelligent territorial planning, in the implementation of sustainable policies, in the management of tourism companies and smart tourist destinations.

Experts in calculating the carbon footprint and implementing ISO 9001, 14001 and SDG quality systems.

products.product_name: Carbon Footprint Calculation (Original name (Spanish): Cálculo de la Huella de Carbono)
products.product_description:
They offer comprehensive advice to public and private entities in the calculation of their Carbon Footprint, as well as support throughout the entire verification process.

In addition, they are in charge of managing registration in MITECO and developing plans to reduce and compensate the Carbon Footprint. Your solution provides the following benefi ts:

  • Development of a calculator personalized to the needs of the scope defined by the organization or entity for scope 1, 2 and 3.
  • Development of memory and documentation necessary for Carbon Footprint Verification under GHG Protocol and ISO 14064:2019 standards; and reduction and/or compensation plans that the client needs.
  • Accompaniment in the verification process under the standard selected by the client until the certificate is obtained.
  • Registration of the process in MITECO, in the Carbon Footprint area.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Tourist Destinations
  • Theme Parks
  • Tourism Offices
  • Hotels
  • Travel Agencies
  • Events and Festivals
  • MICE
  • Active Tourism Companies
  • E-Commerce.

products.product_name: Development of Strategic Plans and DTI together with the implementation of Smart Office DTI and Technical Offices European Funds (Original name (Spanish): Desarrollo de Planes Estratégicos y DTI junto a puesta en marcha Smart Oﬃ ce DTI y Ofi cinas Técnicas Fondos Europeos)
products.product_description:
Development and implementation of strategic plans and directors of smart tourism, based on diagnoses carried out by SEGITTUR and in the case of the Valencian Community, on the self-diagnosis established by Invat·tur.

Its approach is governed by the UNE 178501 standard, which establishes a comprehensive DTI (Smart Tourist Destination) management system. In addition, it offers analysis, development and writing services for tourism sustainability plans. These plans are designed to meet the requirements of the ordinary calls of the Secretary of State for Tourism, as well as the extraordinary calls of the Next Generation European funds.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Tourist Destinations
  • Tourism Offices.

products.product_name: Implementation of Tourism Standards, Advice and Support in the Implementation of Certifications (Original name (Spanish): Implantación Normas Turísticas, Asesoramiento y Acompañamiento en la Puesta en Marcha de Certifi caciones)
products.product_description: Certifications are a distinctive feature for destinations, so with this solution they will opt for advice and implementation Q Tourism Quality; advice and implementation of standard UNE 166006_2018 (R&D&I Management: Surveillance and intelligence system), as well as standard UNE 178501:2018 Management System for Smart Tourist Destinations, through advice and implementation.
products.target_audience:

products.product_name: AI models for the tourism sector (Original name (Spanish): Modelos de IA para sector turístico)
products.product_description: These are solutions based on the analysis of data from the entity's own sources with a large multitude of external sources, resulting in a set of reports in the field of predictive, clustering, segmentation, pattern detection/ profiles and market studies in order to reuse the enormous amount of data that tourism entities accumulate and advance the practical usefulness of its analysis.

products.product_name: User profiling through AI (Original name (Spanish): Perfi lado de usuarios mediante IA)
products.product_description: Given the foreseeable disappearance of cookies as a tracking method, they have developed a user classification system on tourist portals based on activity and the correlation of actions, dynamically profiling users in order to optimize marketing campaigns , cross-selling and other services in which segmentation adds value.

) in order to minimize stops or closures and optimize maintenance, both operationally and at a cost level, ensuring compliance with regulations and safety.

<h2>Nativos Sostenibles</h2>.company_description:
Innovative startup selected by the Valencian Innovation Agency that has developed the first transformative platform and brand for sustainable experiences and tourism, thanks to technology in the Metaverse with the development of projects that combine tourism and sustainability.

Opportunities and technologies are taken advantage of to experience a new way of relating to people, companies and of carrying out sustainability on a daily basis. With the Metaverse, the way humans interact is changed, bringing cities to anyone. To this end, clear, successful and high-impact use cases are proposed. Sustainable Natives changes the way of having experiences in sustainability and tourism, contributing to the democratization of the 2030 Development Goals.

products.product_name: Transforming Experiences, Adapting to a New Reality (Original name (Spanish): Transformando las Experiencias, Adaptándonos a una Nueva Realidad)
products.product_description:
What will you get?

  • You will transform the experience of your users, clients, collaborators and partners, providing them with a unique and innovative experience.
  • You will create memorable and distinctive experiences that will allow users to experience the value proposition in an effective and meaningful way, adapted to reality.
  • You will generate a greater brand impact by effectively transmitting the values ​​and attributes of your company.
  • You will communicate and position new products and projects strategically, allowing users to experience them from the right perspective and generate greater interest and participation.

products.product_name: Interactive Maps (Original name (Spanish): Mapas Interactivos)
products.product_description:
An interactive map is a digital map that allows users to interact with it through a graphical interface.

This may include features such as:

  • Zoom: Users can zoom in or out on the map to see additional details or an overview.
  • Navigation: Users can pan around the map to view different areas.
  • Layers: Users can activate or deactivate different layers of information, such as places of interest, roads or bodies of water.
  • Search: Users can search for specific addresses or places on the map.
  • Additional information: Users can view additional information about places marked on the map, such as names, addresses and opening hours.

products.product_description:
Show your products, services or brand in the most current way possible.

An authentic user experience for your clients and potential clients. Highly recommended for events. To do this, a reception avatar or NPC will be created with an appearance similar to the people in the company. It helps with positioning, before, during and after the event. Offer immersive experiences when communicating your value proposition, products/services. Interact with company representatives in innovative ways. It captures the attention of fair visitors and provides an interactive and enriching experience.

products.product_name: Seeketing - Mobility and user behavior (Original name (Spanish): Seeketing - Movilidad y comportamiento de usuarios)
products.product_description:
The Seeketing solution allows you to measure the flows of human traffic between different points of a locality, allowing you to validate the effectiveness of the actions implemented by the municipality to redirect traffic to the planned areas.

Likewise, these metrics will help the planning of public investments (transport, municipal facilities, etc. The project is based on the installation of SEEKETING NODES hardware at exterior or interior points covering the specifi ed areas, in accordance with the points installation where there is electricity and communications supply. This service also has a system for analyzing the information collected by the NODES, and a platform capable of collecting personal data provided by visitors who wish to do so, and sending messages by proximity to said visitors through SMS or E-Mail.

<h2>PaynoPain</h2>.company_description:
PaynoPain is a successful Spanish fintech that has been active since 2011 providing payment coverage on a global scale and currently has technological projects in more than 12 countries around the world.

Our mission is to make any financial management easy, agile and secure, and to achieve this we constantly seek simple and innovative solutions by putting the most advanced technology at the service of society.

products.product_name: Paylands
products.product_description:
Online payment gateway.

Comprehensive and omnichannel payment gateway with an adaptable, secure and fast interface. It guarantees an agile and intuitive user experience so that the payment process is simple and fast from any device: computer, tablet or smartphone. From a small company to a multinational, PaynoPain has the appropriate structures to manage the payment services you need.

CHANGEiT is a revolutionary payments ecosystem. A white label wallet technology with multiple functionalities that allows payment, sending money and loyalty programs among other options. Leading company in technological innovation for the tourism sector.

With a track record of more than 30 years of experience in creating software and web applications for Travel Agencies. Their knowledge of the tourism sector allows them to understand the needs of agencies and operators and create technological solutions that make it easier for them to launch their operations.

products.product_name: Orbis Travel Agency Management (Original name (Spanish): Orbis Gestión Agencia de Viajes)
products.product_description:
Orbis is a Commercial Management application for Travel Agencies that has more than 4,500 installations nationwide.

A solution that is easy to use, efficient, widely implemented and with excellent after-sales service that allows travel agencies absolute control of all individual and group files in process, manages the control of passengers and tickets and issues receipts , delivery notes and invoices automatically while maintaining exhaustive monitoring of collections and payments. The best option for the mechanization of your agency.

products.product_name: Orbis Portal
products.product_description:
Orbis Portal allows advanced B2B and B2C marketing of any type of tourism product, also integrating a charging system and advanced options such as its own widgets or distribution lists.

This platform presents high web usability and intuitive and fast navigation systems. In addition, it has an advanced statistics, analysis and segmentation system that allows you to get the most out of any action.

<h2>Play and Go Experience</h2>.company_description:
Play&go Experience helps the digital transformation of tourism organizations through technology: gamified digital guides, intelligent data platforms, digital tourist gymkhanas and comprehensive tourist experiences.

They improve the visitor experience with gamification, geolocation, augmented reality and smart data.

products.product_name: TECHNOLOGICAL SOLUTION Gamified mobile guide (Original name (Spanish): SOLUCIÓN TECNOLÓGICA Guía móvil gamifi cada)
products.product_description:
Experiential digital mobile guide that connects the physical and digital world.

Points of Interest (POIs) are geolocated on a 2D and 3D map with multimedia information, encouraging visitors to move around the destination to fulfill missions through gamification:

  • Geolocation: the spatial identification of resources and services in a destination about which multimedia information is offered.
  • Gamifi cation: the use of gaming techniques in the territory to improve the visitor experience and motivate them.
  • Smart data: the use of data generated by visitors, properly grouped and anonymized, to improve their experience and to assist in destination decision-making.
  • Augmented reality, in which digital elements are used to improve information and connect the physical and digital worlds. The value proposition of this solution is articulated around four aspects: innovation , a modular technology platform, low development time and low prices.

products.product_name: TECHNOLOGICAL SOLUTION Digital tourist gymkhana (Original name (Spanish): SOLUCIÓN TECNOLÓGICA Gymkana turística digital)
products.product_description:
• Planning: the general proposal for a digital tourist gymkhana is carried out, the integration of the municipalities and/or resources of the destination and the design of the game mechanics.
  • Development: the content and designs necessary to generate the game flow are generated and created in a digital environment for testing and validation.
  • Start-up: all resources are integrated, QR codes are created and placed in the different municipalities.
  • Measurement of results: identifying the number of visits made to each municipality and/or resources of the destination.

products.product_name: TECHNOLOGICAL SOLUTION Comprehensive tourist experiences (Original name (Spanish): SOLUCIÓN TECNOLÓGICA Experiencias turísticas integrales)
products.product_description:
The connected tourist receives information about the destination and generates intelligent data towards the destination.

Information is transmitted from a multichannel perspective in four phases:

  • Information: the main resources to publicize are identified, information is created in various formats and a narrative (storytelling) is developed that unites them.
  • Geolocation: these resources are located in the destination using online maps, organized from thematic information layers.
  • Integration: the information is developed and integrated in its different formats: texts (development of explanatory texts of the resources and the general narrative), photographs, illustrations and drawings, videos, audio guides (locution of texts), 3D models, virtual reality (360 photos), augmented reality, teaching guides, mobile applications, web pages, digital games, brochures, signs, information panels and QR codes.
  • Data: the necessary tools are created to measure the consumption of information in various formats.

Develops intelligent solutions based on the application of cutting-edge techniques, such as Consumer Neuroscience, Virtual Reality and Artificial Intelligence.

It digitizes spaces through its software, provides data that helps to know the visitor better and personalize the proposal to improve the experience.

products.product_description:
Immerse yourself in a world of immersive experiences that will transport your visitors to surprising places.

With its advanced virtual reality technology and artificial intelligence algorithms, PHYGI not only captivates the senses, but also captures valuable information to enhance your tourism proposal. It also collects strategic data in real time. From analyzing people flows to measuring emotional responses and identifying demographic profiles, PHYGI gives you a complete view of your visitors and helps you understand their preferences. Learn and adapt. Thanks to its artificial intelligence algorithm, it recommends content adapted to each user, becoming an unrivaled prescriber available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Your visitors will get a unique and personalized experience.

<h2>Semanticbots</h2>.company_description:
Company dedicated to the design and development of inclusive conversational platforms, based on chatbots equipped with Artificial Intelligence.

This technology can be adapted to the needs of each client, and its main objective is to make a qualitative leap in digital access to all the information and tourist offers of destinations and companies. Its implementation allows for a more inclusive and sustainable digitalization, being a system that also serves as support to improve the scalability of care services, and a source of data to understand the new needs of tourists and clients.

products.product_name: Sayobo Tourism (Original name (Spanish): Sayobo Turismo)
products.product_description:
Technological tool developed by SemanticBots based on inclusive chatbots for smart tourist destinations and tourism companies.

With the implementation of the Sayobo system, our clients are able to provide tourists and clients with access to all the information and tourist offers in a simpler, more useful and instantaneous way. Our platform helps promote more inclusive and personalized tourism, improving the experience of tourists and clients. The data generated in interactions with people helps companies and destinations adapt communication and marketing strategies, and know what new products or services can be offered. Sayobo's technology is also an ally to support the tourism teams of destinations and tourism companies, helping them resolve the most frequent digital queries in different languages. These types of tools are oriented towards accessibility, sustainability, technological innovation and digitalization plans to improve the quality of tourist services.

products.product_description:
Sensors for detecting mobile devices using Wifi, Bluetooth and BLE interfaces.

With these sensors it is possible to know the resident and visitor tourist flow at the points of interest in a specific area, a technology that has applications such as capacity control or obtaining information to adapt the resources of those more visited.

<h2>Tixalia Worldwide</h2>.company_description:
Leading Leisure Tour Operator in the Traveltech sector, with more than 10 years of experience in the distribution of leisure and associated tourist services, using the most advanced technology.

Tixalia offers the perfect combination between a wide catalog completely specialized in leisure products and the best technological solutions for their distribution.

products.product_name: Tixalia B2B Tixalia White Label
products.product_description: Tixalia White Label: Solution that allows any client to have a functional online locker adapted to their corporate image so that they can offer all products online quickly and easily.

<h2>TYRIS TECH</h2>.company_description:
Tyris Tech is an innovative company (EI) that belongs to the Tyris Software business group, and that develops software based on AI (Artifi cial Intelligence), BI (Business Intelligence), Big Data, OTT (Video) technologies. a la carte) and disruptive technologies.

Founded in 2014 by 4 Doctors and MS in Telecommunications and Computer Science, it currently has more than 15 employees (PhDs, engineers, developers, Project Managers, designers and Marketing experts) and its objective is the development of technological software. Tyris develops innovative projects for large corporations in sectors such as industry, business, health or entertainment, which allow it to identify market opportunities in advance and be able to react quickly with the development and marketing of its own innovative and highly technological products. He also has extensive experience in the development of R&D projects within the EU H2020 framework, together with national calls from the Ministry of Education and Science of Spain, in the development of intelligent solutions based on AI and Business Intelligence for different sectors.

products.product_name: BI Platforms for Tourism (Original name (Spanish): Plataformas de BI para Turismo)
products.product_description:
Intelligent business analytics solutions for decision making through data analysis and visualization.

They work on the exploitation of data through Big Data technologies and apply artificial intelligence algorithms that allow for predictive and prescriptive analysis of the data.

products.product_description:
OTT solution that is marketed in a Software as a Service (SaaS) format.

Galgo presents a modular architecture and is easy to use, equipped with intuitive operation. It is a solution dedicated to the management, publication and distribution of audiovisual content (VOD and Live) to large audiences.

<h2>unBlock the city</h2>.company_description:
The platform allows any space to communicate in a personalized and effective way with citizens.

As well as understanding the interaction, interests and behaviors of users for better decision making.

products.product_name: Smart QR on any medium and space (Original name (Spanish): QR inteligente en cualquier soporte y espacio)
products.product_description:
The unBlock app is capable of distinguishing who is scanning you and offering you content related to your interests.

That is, from the same QR, two people will obtain different information, depending on their tastes.

products.product_description: Through a unique user ID, unBlock provides public and private spaces with access control, capacity and notification management services, in order to provide space managers with greater timely communication capacity. real with visitors to a space or city.

<h2>Woztell</h2>.company_description:
WOZTELL is a company based in Valencia and offices in Hong Kong and Mexico City, with a team made up of more than 50 professionals.

We have been a strategic partner of WhatsApp since 2019 (Business Solution Provider) and patrons of the conversational business chair at the University of Valencia. As a WhatsApp carrier, WOZTELL offers in the field of conversational business, access to WhatsApp Cloud API and ON Premise API among other conversational channels; solutions in PaaS mode to go to market quickly and scale IT without hidden costs; vertical SaaS solutions in DIY mode for SMEs and Mid-Market, and adhoc solutions to modulate the user experience and specific use cases in large accounts.

products.product_name: Woztell Platform: SaaS & PaaS
products.product_description:
The company offers WhatsApp marketing campaign services, using audiences generated from the behavior of tourists.

In addition, it provides secure customer service across all conversational channels, such as WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook Messenger and the web, from a single platform. This can be done through live agents or by activating pre-configured virtual assistants. Likewise, the possibility of building new personalized assistants or improving their skills is provided through extensions available in the Marketplace, which include payment options, integrations with CRM, ChatGPT, Bard, among others. The ability to create your own functionalities on the platform is also offered, both for internal use and to share with other WOZTELL users.

products.product_name: Unifi ed Guest Communication Platform
products.product_description:
Create real connections with each guest in real time through hybrid conversational solutions (bot-human).

This platform allows you to centralize all communications with guests, providing them with a unique experience throughout their stay. Through the messaging application preferred by customers, such as WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook Messenger, Telegram, WeChat, among others, you can manage reservations, accept payments, resolve queries and incidents, and increase income through recommendations and suggestions online during your stay. Some notable features include:

  • Reservation management via WhatsApp integrated with payment gateway.
  • Messaging with guests during their stay.
  • Management and resolution of incidents in real time.
  • Notifications and reservations for activities during the stay.

products.product_name: WhatsApp Tourist Assistant 24x7 (Original name (Spanish): Asistente Turístico WhatsApp 24x7)
products.product_description:
It offers a visitor through WhatsApp and in a 100% secure way, the best experience during the time of their visit, providing them with information about what to do, where and when, in a friendly way and in their language.

Sell your experiences, services and products, through w-commerce 24x7 and align communication with the objectives of your organization, focusing on sales prioritization, visitor satisfaction, tourism sustainability, etc. In addition, this solution also allows you to alert visitors in case of incidents during their visit and activate your segmented campaigns based on their interests, integrating your own LiveChat service team when necessary. A successful case is that of FallasBot, the WhatsApp assistant of the city of Valencia since 2020, which has reported on 5,000 events offered by the 400 fallas throughout the city.
